section.title:
Using
Tags with JSON Data

section.description: On the 'Template' pane of the template tester you can access this JSON Data by using the name of the object enclosed in {} brackets.

Properties inside the object can be referenced by entering the name of the property in {} brackets inside the {employees}{/employees} tags. Because the 'skills' property is itself an array object, it too will also need a closing tag, like this {skills}{/skills}. The 'name' property inside the skills array can be accessed by placing a {name} placholder inside the {skills}{/skills} tags.

This will display some unstructured JSON Data.
tags can be used to format this data into something easier to read.
